verses.text_plain: Hear ye this, O priests; and hearken, ye house of Israel; and give ye ear, O house of the king; for judgment is toward you, because ye have been a snare on Mizpah, and a net spread upon Tabor.
verses.verse_html: 1Hear ye this, O priests; and hearken, ye house of Israel; and give ye ear, O house of the king; for judgment is toward you, because ye have been a snare on Mizpah, and a net spread upon Tabor.

tokens.text: toward you, because ye have been a snare

verses.text_plain: And the revolters are profound to make slaughter, though I have been a rebuker of them all.
verses.verse_html:
2And the revolters are profound to make slaughter, though I have been a rebuker of them all. ▼
▼ though: or, and
 , ▼
▼ a rebuker: Heb. a correction

footnotes.body_html: ▼ a rebuker: Heb. a correction

verses.text_plain: I know Ephraim, and Israel is not hid from me: for now, O Ephraim, thou committest whoredom, and Israel is defiled.
verses.verse_html: 3I know Ephraim, and Israel is not hid from me: for now, O Ephraim, thou committest whoredom, and Israel is defiled.

tokens.text: from me: for now, O Ephraim

verses.text_plain: They will not frame their doings to turn unto their God: for the spirit of whoredoms is in the midst of them, and they have not known the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
4They will not frame their doings to turn unto their God: for the spirit of whoredoms is in the midst of them, and they have not known the Lord. ▼
▼ They will…: or, Their doings will not suffer them
 , ▼
▼ frame: Heb. give

tokens.text: of them, and they have not known

footnotes.body_text: ▼ They will…: or, Their doings will not suffer them
footnotes.body_html: ▼ They will…: or, Their doings will not suffer them

verses.text_plain: And the pride of Israel doth testify to his face: therefore shall Israel and Ephraim fall in their iniquity; Judah also shall fall with them.
verses.verse_html: 5And the pride of Israel doth testify to his face: therefore shall Israel and Ephraim fall in their iniquity; Judah also shall fall with them.

verses.text_plain: They shall go with their flocks and with their herds to seek the Lord; but they shall not find him; he hath withdrawn himself from them.
verses.verse_html: 6They shall go with their flocks and with their herds to seek the Lord; but they shall not find him; he hath withdrawn himself from them.

verses.text_plain: They have dealt treacherously against the Lord: for they have begotten strange children: now shall a month devour them with their portions.
verses.verse_html: 7They have dealt treacherously against the Lord: for they have begotten strange children: now shall a month devour them with their portions.

verses.text_plain: Blow ye the cornet in Gibeah, and the trumpet in Ramah: cry aloud at Beth–aven, after thee, O Benjamin.
verses.verse_html: 8Blow ye the cornet in Gibeah, and the trumpet in Ramah: cry aloud at Beth–aven, after thee, O Benjamin.

verses.text_plain: Ephraim shall be desolate in the day of rebuke: among the tribes of Israel have I made known that which shall surely be.
verses.verse_html: 9Ephraim shall be desolate in the day of rebuke: among the tribes of Israel have I made known that which shall surely be.

verses.text_plain: The princes of Judah were like them that remove the bound: therefore I will pour out my wrath upon them like water.
verses.verse_html: 10The princes of Judah were like them that remove the bound: therefore I will pour out my wrath upon them like water.

verses.text_plain: Ephraim is oppressed and broken in judgment, because he willingly walked after the commandment.
verses.verse_html: 11Ephraim is oppressed and broken in judgment, because he willingly walked after the commandment.

verses.text_plain: Therefore will I be unto Ephraim as a moth, and to the house of Judah as rottenness.
verses.verse_html:
12Therefore will I be unto Ephraim as a moth, and to the house of Judah as rottenness. ▼
▼ rottenness: or, a worm

footnotes.body_html: ▼ rottenness: or, a worm

verses.text_plain: When Ephraim saw his sickness, and Judah saw his wound, then went Ephraim to the Assyrian, and sent to king Jareb: yet could he not heal you, nor cure you of your wound.
verses.verse_html:
13When Ephraim saw his sickness, and Judah saw his wound, then went Ephraim to the Assyrian, and sent to king Jareb: yet could he not heal you, nor cure you of your wound. ▼
▼ king Jareb: or, the king of Jareb: or, the king that should plead

footnotes.body_text: ▼ king Jareb: or, the king of Jareb: or, the king that should plead
footnotes.body_html: ▼ king Jareb: or, the king of Jareb: or, the king that should plead

verses.text_plain: For I will be unto Ephraim as a lion, and as a young lion to the house of Judah: I, even I, will tear and go away; I will take away, and none shall rescue him.
verses.verse_html: 14For I will be unto Ephraim as a lion, and as a young lion to the house of Judah: I, even I, will tear and go away; I will take away, and none shall rescue him.

verses.text_plain: I will go and return to my place, till they acknowledge their offence, and seek my face: in their affliction they will seek me early.
verses.verse_html:
15I will go and return to my place, till they acknowledge their offence, and seek my face: in their affliction they will seek me early. ▼
▼ acknowledge…: Heb. be guilty

footnotes.body_html: ▼ acknowledge…: Heb. be guilty
